title: Sony S200F 2.1-Ch Sound Bar with Built-In Subwoofer and Bluetooth (HT200F)
description:
Give every TV show and movie the sound it deserves from the 2.1ch soundbar with built-in subwoofer. All in a design that easily fits into your home and complements your style.
Designed to match your home
Why can’t a soundbar look as good as it sounds? The compact one-bar design with built-in subwoofer matches your room perfectly.
Simple, compact setup
With the subwoofer built in, there’s no need for another box and extra cables around your room.
Perfect pairing and simple connectivity with your TV
Connecting to your TV has never been easier. With HDMI ARC, one cable gives an easy connection for all your TV audio. You can control both with just one remote, connect wirelessly to the latest Sony Android TV.

Wireless connectivity with your TV: send audio to your soundbar wirelessly with a Bluetooth® connection.
One Cable HDMI ARC: send audio and control information from your TV using just one cable with HDMI ARC.

Hear sound come from all around
Our virtual surround sound technology puts you right at the heart of the movies you love by emulating theater-style surround sound.
Specifications and features:
Give every TV show and movie the sound it deserves, from a 2.1ch soundbar with built-in subwoofer. All in a design that easily fits into your home and complements your style.

2.1ch compact, space saving soundbar
Designed to match your home
Built-in Subwoofer. Power Output : 80Watts
Easy set up with TV
Deep bass with built-in subwoofer
S-Force PRO Front Surround creates cinematic audio
USB and Bluetooth® connections for music playback
One Cable HDMI ARC

Package contains:

Remote Commander (RMT-AH410U)
Batteries
Optical Cable
AC Adaptor
AC Cord
Foot Pad
Wall Mount Template

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.
